name: N. Stanley Scott
content: Business Card | School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science | Queen's University Belfast Top Business Card Professor Stan ScottBSc PhD FBCS FIET SMIEEE EPS Dean of Internationalisation Professor of Computational Science E-mail: Phone: +44 (0)28 9097 4058 Research Profile: pure.qub.ac.uk/en/persons/stan-scott Room: 01.01314 Malone Road PostalAddress: Computer Science Building 16A Malone Road Belfast BT9 5BN Research Interests:   Computational Atomic Physics, High Performance Computing, Parallel Algorithms and Computation, Scientific Computation Research Clusters:   High Performance and Distributed Computing School & University Responsibilities:   EPS Dean of Internationalisation Vice-Chancellor's Envoy to India Internationalisation Strategy Overview Group 1895 Group INTO Academic Sub-Group Academic Review Group Qsis Project Steering Group External Activities:   REF 2014 Panel Member - Sub Panel B11, Computer Science and Informatics Computer Physics Communications, Co-ordinating Principal Editor CPC Program Library, Director NA_HPC EPSRC Network – Scientific Committee Member and Node Lead (QUB) Meet Our People © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures Information Privacy and cookies Website accessibility Freedom of information Modern slavery statement Equality, Diversity and Inclusion University Policies and Procedures © Queen's University Belfast 2024 Manage cookies
